events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their car colliding with a tree on a rainy night.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle registration.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case to ensure proper follow-up.
Acknowledgement email sent to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed photos of the accident.
Investigation team began examining the circumstances surrounding the auto collision and damages claimed.
Investigation completed with no discrepancies found; damages verified to be consistent with reported accident.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering all necessary repairs and vehicle replacement costs.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
Claim was officially approved following the claimant's acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim was issued promptly to the claimant's specified bank account.
The claim file was closed after confirmation that the claimant received the payment and no further issues remained.
All documents and correspondence related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
